name: INSendPaymentIntent
desc: A request to transfer money from the current user’s account to a different user’s account.

items.name: init(payee: INPerson?, currencyAmount: INCurrencyAmount?, note: String?)
items.desc: Initializes the send payment intent object with the specified recipient and payment information.

items.name: var note: String?
items.desc: A note associated with the payment.
